data.eml:eml: A new species of the cicada genus Semia Matsumura, 1917 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) from Vietnam, with a key to the species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pham, Hong-Thai, Constant, Jerome (2013): A new species of the cicada genus Semia Matsumura, 1917 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) from Vietnam, with a key to the species of the genus. Zootaxa 3709 (5): 494-500, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3709.5.7
